article_title: Targeted By Short-Seller, Casino’s Defense Needs Strong French Recovery
article_text:
Under pressure from U.S. short seller Carson Block, French supermarket group Casino released details of its real estate operation in Wednesday’s annual results. But these raise as many questions as they answer.

Gains on property disposals contributed €167 million ($184 million) to the company’s earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization in France in 2015, 23% of the total. This confirms what Mr. Block and equity analysts had suspected: Casino’s French profits have become highly dependent on selling...

twitter.description: Overshadowed by questions raised by a U.S. short seller, French supermarket group Casino is betting on a strong French recovery.
twitter.creator: @stephenwilmot

article_metadata.author: Stephen Wilmot
article_metadata.article.origheadline: This French Grocer Has More Than Activist’s Questions to Answer

article_summary:
Under pressure from U.S. short seller Carson Block, French supermarket group Casino released details of its real estate operation in Wednesday’s annual results.
This confirms what Mr. Block and equity analysts had suspected: Casino’s French profits have become highly dependent on selling...
Gains on property disposals contributed €167 million ($184 million) to the company’s earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization in France in 2015, 23% of the total.
But these raise as many questions as they answer.
